p: In the cost evaluation by dengue disease WHO classifications, compared with patients with SD, patients with DWWS and dengue with warning signs (DWS) had an approximately 36.3% (p<0.001; IRR = 0.637) and 19.3% (p = 0.017; IRR = 0.807) reduction in the duration of hospital stay, respectively. Costs were also lower in less severe cases of dengue fever ( Table 5).
